sentences.en: A judicial forum has nothing to do with what is not before it.
sentences.cn: 法院不能主动寻找案件.

sentences.en: A useful device might be a forum to discuss such issues.
sentences.cn: 设立讨论这些问题的某种论坛也许是一项有益的方法.

sentences.en: Animated was, indeed, the aspect of the forum of Pompeii at that time!
sentences.cn: 那时庞贝广场的面貌也确实生气勃勃!

sentences.en: CMM Calibration - The forum to discuss CMM Calibration ideas experiences, concerns and solutions.
sentences.cn: CMM校准 - 论坛讨论CMM校准的经验 、 疑问和结果.

sentences.en: He pronounced a splendid encomium upon her in the forum.
sentences.cn: 他在广场上为她作了华丽的赞颂。

sentences.en: I really don't feel it's appropriate to continue the discussion in such a large forum.
sentences.cn: 我真地认为,以这样一种大规模座谈会的方式来继续讨论是不适当的.

sentences.en: In the forum the tall columns toppled.
sentences.cn: 广场上高大的柱子倾倒了.

sentences.en: Members of the council agreed that it still had an important role as a forum for discussion.
sentences.cn: 理事会成员一致认为它仍然发挥着论坛的重要作用。

sentences.en: Members of the council agreed that was an important forum for discussion.
sentences.cn: 理事会成员们一致认为那是一个用于讨论的重要论坛。

sentences.en: Television is now an important forum for political debate.
sentences.cn: 电视已成了政治辩论的重要擂台。

sentences.en: The forum is now open to all budding entrepreneurs.
sentences.cn: 这个论坛目前向所有企业家新秀敞开大门。

sentences.en: the new national forum on the environment
The picture above shows the First Ministerial Conference of the Forum.
sentences.cn: 图为首届论坛部长级会议.

sentences.en: They're holding a forum on new ways of teaching history.
sentences.cn: 他们正在举行历史教学讨论会.

sentences.en: Three types: Summit Forum, Theme Forum and Special Topic Forum.
sentences.cn: 主要分为三类: 高峰论坛 、 主题论坛和专题论坛.

sentences.en: Until we a comprehensive help, you can a message in the Forum.
sentences.cn: 在提供全面的服务前, 您可以在论坛上给我们留言.

sentences.en: Whispers around downtown predict major cutbacks soon at Forum East.
sentences.cn: 商业界人士私下预料,东城新区工程不久将大幅度缩减.

trans.tran_cn: 论坛，讨论会，专题讨论节目，集会的公共场所，提供公开讨论的媒体，法庭
trans.tran_en: an organization, meeting, TV programme etc where people have a chance to publicly discuss an important subject
